scripts.dev: concurrently -k -p '[{name}]' -n 'Pug,Styl,Coffee' -c 'bgMagenta.bold,bgRed.bold,bgGreen.bold' 'yarn run pug -O '{version:\\\"$(jq .version package.json)\\\"}' -wP src/index.pug -o www' 'yarn run stylus -w -o www src/*.stylus' 'yarn run coffee -cwo www src/*.coffee'
scripts.build: yarn run pug -O "{production:1, version:'$(jq -r .version package.json)'}" src/index.pug -o page && yarn run stylus -c -o page src/*.stylus && yarn -s run coffee -cto page src/*.coffee && yarn -s run uglifyjs page/*.js > page/main.js

old-scripts.lang:dev: cd src/i18n && while :; do inotifywait -qe close_write *.yml; coffee ../../scripts/lang.coffee ./ --validate --add --spread --build; done
